title: text.collectingGeneratorDesc
Wiring Generator | Track Conductor: Supports for Winged & Non-Winged - Ground & Underwater!

title: option.tickUnit
column3: Value of note. If the value is 2 quarter notes, it will be (quarter note value) * 2.

title: option.nthNote
column3: (2) = half note, (8.) = dotted eighth note, (4..+8-16) = double dotted quarter note + eighth note - 16th note = half note.

title: cell.notePitch
column3: Difference in pitch from a base key (in semitones).

title: cell.time
column3: Time that a note takes for the base note to be heard.

title: cell.interColumnDelay
column3: Delay that a note block moves compared to the previous column.

title: cell.scrollDelay
column3: Delay that the scroll moves compared to the previous column.

title: cell.yDifference
column3: Height difference from the base note.

title: cell.delay
column3: Delay to impose on the column of note.

title: cell.show
column3: Click on a cell to display it below.
